pages.text: $(item)Recipes$() will sometimes drop from $(thing)hostile mobs$() when killed. These Recipes come in a few different tiers, ranging from D all the way to SSS, where Mobs with a higher Level, will drop recipes with a higher tier. Each Recipe holds new Keyblades, Armors and Accessories to be $(moogle)synthesized$().

To increase the tier of a recipe, you can either combine 2 recipes of the same tier together to receive a recipe that is one tier higher than those you combined, combine 4 of the same tier together, to receive one that is 2 tiers higher, or craft one high-tier recipe, to turn it into a tier below it.
